column4: Okay can anyone help me with upgrade from ext3 to ext4 w/o formating? Found http://maketecheasier.com/how-to-upgrade-from-ext3-to-ext4-without-formatting-the-hard-disk/2009/04/21 site but there is something im not sure of
go ahead and ask the channel
sorry, i don't see what you're referring to. you're replacing the device name in both locations, right?
